mapper.update: update tb_meeting set status=#{status} where uuid=#{uuid}
mapper.select: SELECT m.id, m.uuid, u.name, m.`desc`, m.place, m.type, m.date, DATE_FORMAT(m.start, '%H:%i') AS START, DATE_FORMAT(m.end, '%H:%i') AS END, ( SELECT GROUP_CONCAT(u.name SEPARATOR "„ÄÅ") FROM sys_user u WHERE u.status=1 AND JSON_CONTAINS(m.members, CONVERT(u.id,CHAR)) ) AS members FROM tb_meeting m JOIN sys_user u ON m.creator_id = u.id WHERE instance_id =#{instanceId}

SELECT m.uuid,m.title,u.name,date_format(m.date,'%Y-%m-%d') as date,m.place, date_format(m.start,'%H:%i') as start, date_format(m.end,'%H:%i') as end, m.type,m.status,m.desc FROM tb_meeting m JOIN sys_user u on m.creator_id=u.id WHERE m.uuid=#{uuid} and u.status=1
